item.title: Building splash screens in React Native
item.description: In this tutorial, weâ€™ll demonstrate how to build a splash screen in React Native. Weâ€™ll walk you through how to build stunning welcome displays for both iOS and Android apps using react-native-splash-screen.

item.title: Differences between Props and State in React
item.description: Recently, I’ve been exploring React, and during my research, I’ve come across the use of Props and State quite frequently. So, what are they and how do they differ? Let’s delve into that in this article!

item.title: React Native - Redux Saga Basics
item.description: Hello everyone, in this article, I would like to share some of the knowledge I’ve gathered about Redux Saga. I hope you all find it informative.

item.title: Microservices, Eureka and Zuul Gateway User Manual - Part 3
item.description:
In this section, let’s explore Spring Cloud Configuration.

Spring Cloud Configuration is a module within the Spring Cloud ecosystem that provides tools for building distributed systems and microservices applications. Spring Cloud Configuration specifically focuses on centralized and flexible management of application configurations.

item.title: Microservices, Eureka and Zuul Gateway User Manual - Part 2
item.description:
In the previous article, we successfully built a simple microservice system consisting of the User service, Eureka server, and Zuul gateway.

In this article, we will delve into understanding JWT and the approach to authentication and security within the Microservice architecture using JWT.

item.title: Microservices, Eureka and Zuul Gateway User Manual - Part 1
item.description: This article provides a detailed guide on deploying and using the Microservice architecture in combination with the Eureka and Zuul Gateway tools. These steps outline the fundamentals of building a flexible and scalable distributed system.
